attributes.action: Shut Schools and prevent the spread of Covid-19!
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government/parliament to shut down schools, to prevent students and teachers contracting COVID-19.
Being 15 and at a school where most kids don’t follow the rules of coronavirus example:
• not staying in their year group bubbles,
• not staying the two metre distance. 
Being in a classroom sat next to 20+ children who hangout with their bubble of 6 outside of school, who could that 6 bubble be? Where have they gone? Who have they visited? Everyone is at risk. 
Stay Safe and prevent Covid-19!
attributes.background: I want the government/parliament to shut down schools, having another lockdown will impact this country in the best way possible, preventing the spread of COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
